column4: was it "MagicTouch" you were looking for, i remember somebody looking at that when asking about a touch screen
nope what i've seen is a few xorg drivers... specifically xserver-xorg-input-elo2300 xserver-xorg-input-evtouch xserver-xorg-input-palmax. don't know what magictouch is
np, thought it was worth mentioning just in case
ah yes, it's another driver. so bpssoft, the ones above, plus xserver-xorg-input-magictouch might be what you want.
